subSections.title: Related characters
subSections.text:
* {{l|mul|[[沖]]}} ''(Orthodox form of'' <big>冲</big>)
* {{l|mul|[[衝]]}} ''({{w|Traditional Chinese}} form of ''<big>冲</big>)

subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
An unorthodox variant {{Han simp|沖|f=氵|t=冫|nocap=y}} that can be found in various historical dictionaries such as the {{w|Kangxi dictionary}}. <!-- See also: http://dict.variants.moe.edu.tw/variants/rbt/word_attribute.rbt?quote_code=QTAyMTUwLTAwMQ#32 -->

Eventually adopted as an official character by the People's Republic of China. <!-- Exact time period is unknown. Not found in https://zh.wikisource.org/wiki/漢字簡化方案 (1956) or https://zh.wikisource.org/wiki/簡化字總表 (1964) -->

subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text: {{Han simp|衝}} in the {{w|Chinese Character Simplification Scheme|first round simplification}} of Chinese characters by the People's Republic of China in 1956.<!-- Refer https://zh.wikisource.org/wiki/漢字簡化方案 --> Note that {{zh-l|衝*|[[chōng]]}} and {{zh-l|沖*|[[chōng]]}} are homonyms.

subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=|rs=冫04}}

# {{alt-form|lang=ja|沖||[[open sea]]; [[offing]]}} <!-- Note: Used as a noun in Japanese. Different usage compared to Chinese where it is used as a verb. -->
